alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 12:32AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale and Coffee Counties through 130 AM CST... At 1232 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Brundidge to 6 miles east of Andalusia. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Lee, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field and Gerald. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
